title: Emma Weymouth's Strictly Diary: 'Oti told me to suck it up, so it's time to up the ante'
text:
The Viscountess on frame, focus, meltdowns and stepping back in time for a Downton Abbey foxtrot

Standing under those burning spotlights at the end of Sunday’s results show, waiting to hear our names called out for the first time, was sheer terror. To make matters worse, when the lovely Tess Daly said, “Emma and A…” our hearts leapt, only to hear her finish with “A…nton” not “Aljaž”! Eventually our names did get called out and we’re so very grateful to everyone who voted.

Testament to just how much this means to me is the torrent of emotion that unexpectedly erupted during rehearsals this week. Terrible Tuesdays are real! We’re dancing a slow Foxtrot on Saturday and I had my first meltdown...
description: The Viscountess on frame, focus, meltdowns and stepping back in time for  a Downton Abbey foxtrot
